name: Roller Coaster Simulator
description:
Roller Coaster Simulator is a simulation app that lets you build and ride roller coasters in virtual reality. There are currently seven roller coasters to ride and you can build roller coasters with your gyroscope. The Roller Coaster Simulator provides and easy way to change between normal view and stereographic 3d allowing for both narrow vr anytime or broad vr with a virtual reality head mounted display.

To play select a roller coaster in the menu and move your phone around to change your view and look around.

This game is a way to demonstrate the virtual reality capabilities of IOS. More to come soon in the virtual reality pipeline.
